title: Bella Hadid 'received birthday message from ex The Weeknd before spending time with him'
text:
They recently split in August.

But it seems that Bella Hadid and The Weeknd are still on friendly terms.

Insiders have revealed that Bella received a birthday message from her ex The Weeknd, before leaving dinner in his car, according to E! News.

Reunion? It seems that Bella Hadid and The Weeknd, 29, are on friendly terms, as the duo reportedly spent time together on her 23rd birthday on Wednesday

Bella was celebrating her 23rd birthday with her sister Gigi and pals at Miss Lily's, before leaving the restaurant 'by herself' and getting 'into The Weeknd's car,' a source told E! News.

The singer, real name Abel Makkonen Tesfaye, reportedly reached out to his ex earlier in the day to send her well-wishes for her birthday.

'The Weeknd did reach out to Bella during the day to wish her a 'Happy Birthday' and they have been in touch,' another source told the site.

Despite their reunion, it appears as though the two are staying single for now.

'There is no bad blood between the two and they are on good terms right now. There isn't any chance of them getting back together right now but Bella never wants to have any anger or resentment towards anyone.'

Celebration: The model reportedly left with her former love following dinner at Miss Lily's with sister Gigi, Dua Lipa, and her pals

In August, the notorious on-off couple split again due to 'distance.'

'They are in different places right now, physically and mentally,' a source began, in a chat with E!.

'Bella is prepping for her fashion week commitments and Abel is working on his music and his upcoming acting debut.'

Love lives: Bella and The Weeknd began dating in around May 2015, after connecting the month before. They are seen in February in New York in 2019

Bella and The Weeknd began dating in around May 2015, after connecting the month before.

The couple would split in November 2016. The Weeknd would go on to date Selena Gomez from January until October 2017.

The following spring, the duo would begin dating again, before splitting up last month.
description: They recently split in August. But it seems that Bella Hadid and The Weeknd are on friendly terms, as the duo reportedly spent time together on her 23rd birthday on Wednesday.
